search_source.short_description: SearchSource for the ACM digital Library
SearchSource for the AIS electronic Library (AISeL)
Performs a search in a CoLRev project
Performs a search in the LocalIndex
Performs a forward search based on OpenCitations
Performs a backward search extracting references from PDFs using GROBID
SearchSource for PDF directories (based on GROBID)
SearchSource for Transport Research International Documentation
SearchSource for directory containing video files

load_conversion.short_description: Loads Excel (xls, xlsx) files (based on pandas)
Loads reference strings from text (md) files (based on GROBID)

prep.short_description: Preparation of curations
Prepares records by excluding collection entries (e.g., proceedings)
Prepares records by excluding complementary materials
Prepares records by excluding ones that are not in the languages_to_include
Prepares records by excluding ones that have a non-latin alphabet
Prepares records by applying polishing rules
Prepares records based on SemanticScholar metadata
Prepares records by retrieving its DOI from the website (URL)
Prepares records based on citeas.org metadata
Prepares records based on crossref.org metadata
Prepares records based on dblp.org metadata
Prepares records based on doi.org metadata
Prepares records based on Europe PCM metadata
Prepares records based on LocalIndex metadata
Prepares records based on openlibrary.org metadata
Prepares records based on Pubmed metadata
Prepares records based on year-volume-issue dependency
Prepares records by removing IDs (DOIs/URLs) that do not match with the metadata
Prepares records by removing invalid IDs DOIs/ISBNs
Prepares records by removing urls that are not available
Prepares records by resolving BibTex crossref links (e.g., to proceedings)
Prepares records based on the prepare scripts specified by the SearchSource
Prepares records by updating the metadata status

prep_man.short_description: Manual preparation based on exported and imported metadata (and PDFs if any)
Manual preparation based on a Jupyter Notebook

dedupe.short_description: Active learning: training phase (minimum sample size of 50 required)
Deduplication endpoint for curations with full journals/proceedings
Deduplication of remaining records in a curated metadata repository
Simple duplicate identification (for small sample sizes)

pdf_get.short_description: Get PDFs from webisite screenshot (for "online" ENTRYTYPES)

pdf_get_man.short_description: Get PDFs manually based on a CLI

pdf_prep.short_description: Prepare PDFs by creating an annotated TEI document
Prepare PDFs by checking and applying OCR (if necessary) based on OCRmyPDF
Prepare PDFs by removing unnecessary cover pages (e.g. researchgate, publishers)
Prepare PDFs by removing unnecessary last pages (e.g. copyright notices, cited-by infos)
Prepare PDFs by validating its completeness (based on the number of pages)
Prepare PDFs by validating it against its associated metadata

pdf_prep_man.short_description: Manually prepare PDFs based on a CLI (not yet implemented)

screen.short_description: Screen documents using tables (exported and imported)

data.short_description: Export the sample references in Endpoint format
Export the literature review into a Github Page
Export the sample into an Obsidian database
Synthesize the literature in a markdown paper
